Made an embarrassing spelling mistake on your APP ?

In todays world of social media, these silly mistakes can make your brand's reputation for for a toss. While on websites, you can quickly fix these errors, but for mobiles apps you have to wait for all of your users to upgrade to the build with the fix.
This wait can be excruciating !
Use Appscms to get ability to change strings in you mobile APP, as per your wish, and be well prepared to quickly handle any such embarrassing situation.

Features that make us Stand Out

We provide simple solutions to complex problems

Over the air update for string changes

You can change any string of you app from Appscms, and those changes will be pushed to your user's mobile over the air !

Multi-locale content management system

Appscms natively supports multiple locales. You can add new locale or change value for any locale using Appcms and those changes will get reflected on your users mobile apps, without them needing to upgrade.
